name: mri_cor2label
description: Converts values in a volume or surface overlay to a label. Designed to convert parcellation volumes stored in mri format.

inputs.description: Input volume or surface overlay file.
inputs.name: Input File

inputs.description: Value to match in the input data.
inputs.name: Label Identifier

inputs.description: Name of the output label file.
inputs.name: Output Label File

inputs.description: Threshold the input to make label, e.g., input values must be greater than the threshold.
inputs.name: Threshold Value

inputs.description: Write the label volume to a file.
inputs.name: Volume File

inputs.description: Interpret input as a surface overlay, specifying subject, hemisphere, and surface.
inputs.name: Surface Overlay

inputs.description: Specify surface path rather than subject/hemisphere.
inputs.name: Surface Path

inputs.description: Treat input as a probability map and optimize thresholding.
inputs.name: Optimize

inputs.description: Remove holes in label and islands (only valid with --surf).
inputs.name: Remove Holes and Islands

inputs.description: Dilate label with specified number of dilations (only valid with --surf).
inputs.name: Dilate

inputs.description: Erode label with specified number of erosions (only valid with --surf).
inputs.name: Erode
